text.div: • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 400177003 (Neoplasm and/or hamartoma (morphologic abnormality))

name: VS_Morphology_SNOMED
title: ValueSet Morphology SNOMED
publisher: Berlin Institute of Health at Charité (BIH)

contact.name: Berlin Institute of Health at Charité (BIH)

description: The ValueSet contains the morphology (histology) codes from SNOMED CT.
